i18n.key: This is the label for the payment method used in backoffice and in the payment method selection step of the ordering process.
payment method code used on all the invoices and when exporting the orders.
The currency accepted by the connector. An empty field means 'any currency'.
This is the maximum amount accepted by the connector.
This is the minimum amount accepted by the connector.
Use the HTTPS protocol for communications between the bank and the website.
